trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Irill has something to tell you.
TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_TODO_00<tab>Speak with citizens of the Crystarium.
TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_IRILL_000_000<tab>Oh─it is you! On behalf of all of us, thank you for fighting for the Crystarium!

TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_IRILL_000_001<tab>As a matter of fact, several citizens have prepared small gifts for you to show their appreciation. I said that if I saw you, I would let you know, and...here you are!

TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_IRILL_000_002<tab>The ones that I have heard from are Julstan in Musica Universalis, Tobyl in Sweetsieve, and one of the instructors with the Facet of Gathering...what was her name again? No matter─you will find her at the Quadrivium, with the children.
TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_IRILL_000_003<tab>When you have a moment, please speak with them!
TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_IRILL_000_004<tab>You should stop by Musica Universalis, Sweetsieve, and the Quadrivium when you have a moment. Everyone is eager to thank you personally!
TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_JULSTAN_000_010<tab>Thank you for stopping by! I very much wanted to present this to you directly.

TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_JULSTAN_000_011<tab>You probably won't be surprised that this is what we came up with, but─the merchants here thought that a piece of armor would be most useful to you, so we pooled our funds for this. May it serve you well!
TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_TOBYL_000_012<tab>Greetings─and heartfelt thanks! It's only because you fought for us that our vegetable plots remain intact, and we may continue to live peacefully.

TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_TOBYL_000_013<tab>It is but a meager offering in comparison to what you've done for us, but we've prepared some food using the vegetables grown here for you to take with you on your journey. I hope that it suits your palate!
TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_GARDENERB03564_000_014<tab>Oh, I'm so glad that you haven't already left the city! I wanted to present you with this gift─it's from all of us.

TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_GARDENERB03564_000_015<tab>We wanted to give you something homegrown, but were worried about burdening you too much...so we used fruit from the orchards to make juice! Hopefully it will make for a refreshing treat on the road.
TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_JULSTAN_000_016<tab>Stay safe out there! None of us wants to lose you.
TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_TOBYL_000_017<tab>Wheresoever you may go, I hope that you will think of the Crystarium when you eat the food that we prepared for you.
TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_GARDENERB03564_000_018<tab>When I say “we,” I do mean all of us. The children had a bit of difficulty pressing the lemons, but we got there in the end!
TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_IRILL_000_020<tab>You met with everyone, then? Wonderful! If you like, I can prepare those gifts for you to carry more easily.
TEXT_LUCKZJ001_03564_IRILL_000_021<tab>Here you are! And please know that no matter where you travel, you'll be in our thoughts.
